stimulusHtml:
MnO4− + 5 Fe2+ + 8 H+ → Mn2+ + 5 Fe3+ + 4 H2O

In the reaction represented above, the number of MnO4- ions that react must be equal to which of the following?
choicesHtml: One-fifth the number of Fe2+ ions that are consumed
Eight times the number of H+ ions that are consumed
Five times the number of Fe3+ ions that are produced
One-half the number of H2O molecules that are produced
